熸熸熸

熸字的基本解释

熸
jiān
熄灭：“母独从容以絮被濡水，往覆然处，火立熸。”
溃败：“子瑕卒，楚师熸。”
烧毁；灭亡：如“始皇焚书，故熸焉。”

熸字的汉语字典释义

[①]［jiān］
［《廣韻》子廉切，平鹽，精。］
(1)熄灭。
(2)消遁；消失。
(3)战败；覆没。
(4)失陷。
(5)终尽。

熸字的康熙字典解释

【巳集中】【火字部】　熸； 康熙笔画：16； 页码：页681第20
【廣韻】【集韻】【韻會】【正韻】?將廉切，音尖。【玉篇】火滅也。【孔叢子·廣詁一】熸，滅也。【左傳·襄二十六年】王夷師熸。【註】吳楚之閒，謂火滅爲熸。又【昭二十三年】楚師熸。【註】其軍人無復氣勢。【劉向·說苑】卜戰龜熸。　又【集韻】慈鹽切，音潛。義同。

熸字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体韩国明朝体
熸字的起名意思

暂无。

extinguish
Basic explanation of words
extinguish
jiān
Extinguished: "The mother alone is calmly moistened by the flocculent, and the flames stand in flames everywhere."
Defeated: "Zi Xiazu, Chu Shixi."
Burned down; perished: such as "The first emperor burned the book, so it is 熸yan."
extinguish
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［jiān］
["Guangyun" Zilian cut, flat salt, fine. ]
(1) Extinguished.
(2) Escape; disappear.
(3) Defeated; annihilated.
(4) Lost.
(5) End up.
extinguish
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Si Collection] [Fire Word Department] 　熸; Kangxi Strokes: 16; Page Number: Page 681 No. 20
[Guang Yun] [Ji Yun] [Rhyme Meeting] [Zheng Yun]? Cut Lian, the sound tip. [Jade articles] The fire is also extinguished. 【Kong Congzi·Guangzhou 1】Zhi, extinction. [Zuo Zhuan·Xiang Twenty-sixth Year] Wang Yi Shixi. 【Note】Wu Chu’s leisure, it is said that the fire is extinguished. Also [Twenty-Three Years of the Show] Chu Shixi. [Note] The soldiers have no resilience. 【Liu Xiang·Shuoyuan】Bu Zhanguixi.　[Jiyun] Kindly cut, sound potential. The same meaning.
extinguish
